short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your favorite ebooks with Ebook Plus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly and easily search for your favorite books and narrow down your search for books using our "Ebook plus" extension. Just search with the extension browser action modal or address bar. 

This extension updates browser search provider and enable users to get results for books.

Two ways to Search for books:
1. Pin the extension using the "puzzle" shape icon in the top right corner of your browser and search for books
2. Input your search keyword in the omni search bar

Easily get access to thousands of books search results with this extension.

This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Allows for custom books searches directly from your browser omnibox
- Sets Yahoo as the default search setting in your browser"
